meanings.definition: To remove from a list or roster.
meanings.sent1: The teacher delists students who misbehave.
meanings.sent2: She delists items that are out of stock.
meanings.sent3: The grocery store delists expired products to keep customers safe.
meanings.sent4: The librarian delists old books to make space for new ones.
meanings.sent5: The manager delists unprofitable products to improve sales.

meanings.definition: To take off a stock exchange.
meanings.sent1: The company delists its shares from the stock market.
meanings.sent2: Investors panic when a company delists suddenly.
meanings.sent3: The stock market delists companies that do not meet the requirements.
meanings.sent4: The decision to delist caused a stir in the financial world.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's announcement to delist shocked shareholders.
